text: Vilém Holáň (23 September 1938 – 5 March 2021) was a Czech politician. He was Minister of Defense for KDU-ČSL from 1994 to 1996. He was an observer to the European Parliament in 2003 and 2004. Holáň was born in Ostrava. Holáň died on 5 March 2021, aged 82.Zemřel někdejší místopředseda KDU-ČSL Vilém Holáň. V letech 1994 až 1996 vedl ministerstvo obrany ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Czech politicians
title: Vilém Holáň
